pkgmetadata.longdescription: ILinq=====.. image:: https://gitlab.com/yassu/ilinq/badges/master/pipeline.svgThis project provides the module like linq of C# for Python.`Documentation <https://yassu.gitlab.io/ilinq/>`_How To Install--------------:: $ pip install ilinqFor developers, we enter:: $ pip install pipenv $ pipenv install --devFirst Example-------------:: #!/usr/bin/env python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- from ilinq.ilinq import Linq def is_prime(n): if n < 2: return False for j in range(2, n): if n % j == 0: return False return True if __name__ == '__main__': print( Linq(range(10**4)) .last(is_prime)) # => 9973LICENSE-------Apache 2.0
